comment._content: Witness in the Hans B. Schmidt murder trial. Bertha Zech, 21 years old, a servant, held as a material witness. Accord to Aluret she had been in his employ last November. ... Source: query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9C07E3D8123FE633A...
